name: CreateIssueReply
description:
Create a reply to an existing issue.

Use this tool to add a comment or response to an existing issue when interaction or follow-up is required.

parameters.name: issue_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the issue to which you want to reply.

parameters.name: issue_reply_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details like body_html, attachment URLs, and optional user or contact IDs for posting the reply. Also includes email information for cc, bcc, and to fields.

attachment_urls.description: An array of attachment URLs to attach to this issue.

body_html.description: The body of the message in HTML.

contact_id.description: Optional contact ID to post the message as. Only one of user_id or contact_id can be provided.

message_id.description: The ID of the message to reply to.

user_id.description: Optional user ID to post the message as. Only one of user_id or contact_id can be provided.
